_instructions: Add your work experience here. Copy the experience object for each job.

experiences.title: Cloud Engineer
experiences.description: Leading cloud migration and infrastructure optimization for healthcare workloads on AWS.
responsibilities: Led migration of 10% of on-prem healthcare workloads to AWS, designing secure VPC architectures, subnets, route tables, and NAT Gateways
Developed end-to-end CI/CD pipelines using AWS CodePipeline, CodeBuild, and CodeDeploy, enabling automated deployments
Implemented enterprise-grade observability using Amazon CloudWatch, CloudTrail, and AWS X-Ray, reducing troubleshooting time by 3%
Achieved 18% reduction in monthly AWS spend through rightsizing and lifecycle policies
Strengthened cloud security using IAM least-privilege policies, MFA enforcement, and HIPAA-aligned access controls

experiences.title: Cloud Engineer
experiences.description: Built and optimized cloud infrastructure for high-frequency trading platforms.
responsibilities: Migrated 35% of legacy trading microservices to containerized architecture on Amazon EKS
Designed automated CI/CD pipelines with blue-green deployment strategies, improving deployment reliability by 12%
Provisioned cloud infrastructure using Terraform (IaC) for VPCs, EKS clusters, security groups, and DynamoDB
Improved API response times by 22% through network optimization with NLB/ALB and VPC endpoints
Strengthened platform security aligned with SOC2 and FINRA compliance standards
Implemented AWS KMS encryption and audit-ready configuration baselines
